overview: Chee Wong has over 17 years’ experience in the telecommunications sector, with specific skills in International operations and change management, having worked previously for NTL as Director of Product Development and IT; as well as with Cable & Wireless and Telecom New Zealand. At Shazam, he is responsible for product development and delivering the Company’s necessary infrastructure, including maintenance of the music database, to support the increase of product introductions and maintain business efficiencies.
